title: Album Page, "Sketches Possibly of Fireplace from Château de Blois, France", late 19th century
medium: Graphite on very smooth, off-white wove paper tipped into binding with fabric
inscribed: Recto, in graphite, lower right corner (perpendicular to drawing): 94; at center, inscribed in circle): Note / the fond of colour on the / pilaster is green very / grey - made with indigo; below: this should come out more; These are the mouldings of / pilster carried around / . . . . ; upper right: section of modillion / total relief about .022 / the fond of H's a dark blue / (inscribed in circle): Note the fond of scroll in / cornice is of dark fle...; Important Note - in medallion the center is slightly convex / and the H is on a level with the frame of medallion / the crown projects a little more - / Note - / in the decoration of flat space on the chimney the line separating / the crossing lines which surround the H and fleur de lis / are black.
dimensions: Sheet: 20 x 30.9 cm (7 7/8 x 12 3/16 in.), sheet
description: Horizontal sheet tipped vertically into binding so that left edge of sheet is bottom of drawing space.  At left is a profile view with dimensions, possibly of a modillion.  To the right of this is a letter H inscribed in an oval and above, the section of another architectural element.

tombstone.epitaph: Album Page, "Sketches Possibly of Fireplace from Château de Blois, France", late 19th century.Graphite on very smooth, off-white wove paper tipped into binding with fabric. Gift of Mrs. William Greenough. 1943-51-270.
